classData.comment:
/**
 * The class contains utility methods for working with DOMRect Objects
 * @class Neo.util.Rectangle
 * @extends DOMRect
 */
classData.description: The class contains utility methods for working with DOMRect Objects
classData.name: Rectangle

classData.comment:
/**
     * Checks if rect1 does not have an intersection with rect2
     * !includes() is true for intersections as well
     * @param {Object} rect1
     * @param {Object} rect2
     * @returns {Boolean}
     */
classData.description: Checks if rect1 does not have an intersection with rect2 !includes() is true for intersections as well
classData.name: excludes

classData.comment:
/**
     * Returns the overlapping area of rect1 & rect2
     * @param {Object} rect1
     * @param {Object} rect2
     * @returns {Number} The area (x * y)
     */
classData.description: Returns the overlapping area of rect1 & rect2
classData.name: getIntersection

classData.comment:
/**
     * Returns the overlapping area of rect1 & rect2
     * @param {Object} rect1
     * @param {Object} rect2
     * @returns {Object} x, y & area
     */
classData.description: Returns the overlapping area of rect1 & rect2
classData.name: getIntersectionDetails

classData.description: Checks if rect2 is fully contained inside rect1
classData.name: includes

classData.comment:
/**
     * Checks if rect2 is not contained inside rect1.
     * This could be an intersection or being fully excluded.
     * @param {Object} rect1
     * @param {Object} rect2
     * @param {String} side bottom, left, right or top
     * @returns {Boolean}
     */
classData.description: Checks if rect2 is not contained inside rect1. This could be an intersection or being fully excluded.
classData.name: leavesSide

classData.comment:
/**
     * Adjusts a DOMRect object to a new position
     * @param {Object} rect
     * @param {Number|null} [x=null]
     * @param {Number|null} [y=null]
     * @returns {Object} movedRect
     */
classData.description: Adjusts a DOMRect object to a new position
classData.name: moveBy

classData.comment:
/**
     * Adjusts a DOMRect object to a new position
     * @param {Object} rect
     * @param {Number|null} [x=null]
     * @param {Number|null} [y=null]
     * @returns {Object} movedRect
     */
classData.description: Adjusts a DOMRect object to a new position
classData.name: moveTo

classData.description: Checks if the other Rectangle is fully contained inside this Rectangle
classData.name: contains

classData.description: Returns a clone of this Rectangle expanded according to the edges array.
classData.name: expand

classData.comment:
/**
     * Returns `true` if this Rectangle completely contains the other Rectangle
     * @param {Rectangle} other
     */
classData.description: Returns true if this Rectangle completely contains the other Rectangle
classData.name: contains

classData.comment:
/**
     * Returns a copy of this Rectangle constrained to fit within the passed Rectangle
     * @param {Rectangle} constrainTo
     * @returns {Rectangle|Boolean} A new Rectangle constrained to te passed Rectangle, or false if it could not be constrained.
     */
classData.description: Returns a copy of this Rectangle constrained to fit within the passed Rectangle

returns.description: A new Rectangle constrained to te passed Rectangle, or false if it could not be constrained.

classData.name: constrainTo

classData.description: When using JSON.stringify(this), we want to add minHeight & minWidth to the output.
classData.name: toJSON
